title: Fantasy Music Pack 2
description: This is a music pack featuring twenty four fantasy-based instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral effects, all of the pieces within this asset pack are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present Fantasy Music Pack 2! This is an asset pack that contains twenty four orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of fantasy. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


A King Falls - E Minor - 140 BPM

An Army Of Ghosts - A Minor - 86 BPM

Battle Of The River Barge - G Major - 70 BPM

Broken Shields - B Minor - 112 BPM

Dark Forest - C Minor - 66 BPM

Doom Mountain - C Minor - 110 BPM

Dragon's Lair - G Minor - 90 BPM

Frozen Tundra Battle - B Minor - 132 BPM

Insurrection - C Minor - 134 BPM

Prophecy Of Kings - C Minor - 71 BPM

Royalty Approaches - F Minor - 93

The Battle Of The Bay - C Minor - 70 BPM

The Bezerker Conquest - Ab Minor - 70 BPM

The Conqueror - A Major - 81 BPM

The Deepest Cave - E Major - 71 BPM

The Free Cities - D Major - 117 BPM

The King's Throne - Bb Major - 71 BPM

The King's War - G Major - 140 BPM

The Lagoon - D Minor - 70 BPM

The Long Night - E Minor - 120 BPM

The Temple of Knowledge - C Minor - 138 BPM

The Warlock - Ab Minor 129 BPM

Undying Faith - A Major - 68 BPM

War - E Minor - 140 BPM
